property.name: Keywords
property.value: Setup: Add 2 resources to Denethor's resource pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Move 1 resource from Denethor’s resource pool to another Gondor hero’s resource pool. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Spend 2 resources from attached hero’s resource pool to draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the Gondor trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Azain Silverbeard participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, spend 1 Ï resource to deal 2 damage to another enemy that shares a Trait with the destroyed enemy. Any player may trigger this response.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Warrior character is destroyed while defending against an enemy attack, deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to that character’s printed Û.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Glorfindel can be played from your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard a card from your hand to ready Glorfindel. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: When a shadow card increases an enemy’s Û by any amount, increase the defending character's Ú by 3 for that attack. Then, the players as a group may spend 2 Ïresources to ready the defending character and give it +3 Û for its next attack this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard a card from your hand to heal 1 damage on any 1 character. (Limit twice per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a player. That player searches the top 5 cards of his deck for a card, adds it to his hand, and shuffles his deck. Then, players as a group may spend 3 Ì resources to have that player search his deck for another card, add it to his hand, and shuffle his deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to play Guardian of Rivendell from your hand, you must discard 2 cards from your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only if you control 2 or fewer heroes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, if your threat is higher than 20, treat your threat as if it is 20.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Prepare the Corsair deck. Players prepare their fleet. Prepare the Stormcaller’s area with a second quest deck consisting of only stages 2C, 3C, and 4C, as well as the Stormcaller (see insert). Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Rolling Seas, and add it to the staging area (2 copies instead if there are 3 or more players in the game). Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), move 2 progress from Swift Departure to the Stormcaller's quest stage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Swift Raider and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
No more than 8 progress can be placed here each round. If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), no more than 4 progress can be placed here each round instead.
When you defeat this stage, if the Stormcaller is at stage 2, you have caught up to the Stormcaller and win the game. Otherwise, advance to the next stage.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the end of the staging step, if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), reveal an additional encounter card from the top of the encounter deck.
When you defeat this stage, if the Stormcaller is still at stage 3, you have caught up to the Stormcaller and win the game. Otherwise, advance to the next stage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Weather treachery is discarded. Resolve that card’s “when revealed” effect. That effect cannot be canceled.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After a Weather treachery is revealed, deal 1 damage to each Ship objective and Ship enemy at this stage.
If you defeat this stage, you have caught up to the Stormcaller and win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the players are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), the Stormcaller gets +2 $. No more than 4 damage may be placed on the Stormcaller each round. Forced: At the end of the round, discard the top card of the encounter deck. the Stormcaller places progress on this stage equal to its $ plus the $ of the discarded card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Sahír's Escort and add it to the Stormcaller's area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the players are off-course (Cloudy, Rainy, or Stormy), the Stormcaller gets +2 $. No more than 8 damage may be placed on the Stormcaller each round. Forced: At the end of the round, discard the top card of the encounter deck. the Stormcaller places progress on this stage equal to its $ plus the $ of the discarded card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the end of the round, discard the top card of the encounter deck. the Stormcaller places progress on this stage equal to its $ plus the $ of the discarded card.
If the Stormcaller defeats this stage, Captain Sahír has gotten away with the key, and the players lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When the Stormcaller advances to the next quest stage, return it to the Stormcaller's area.
If the Stormcaller leaves play, the players win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Sahír's Escort is in the Stormcaller’s area, it contributes its $ to the amount of progress the Stormcaller places on its quest stage each round. When Revealed: Add Sahír’s Escort to the Stormcaller’s area, instead of the players’ staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Swift Raider is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After a player commits 4 or more characters to a Sailing test or to the quest, Swift Raider engages that player.”

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Corsair Skiff engages you from the staging area, either raise your threat by 3 or it gains Boarding 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Corsair Seafarer gets +1 Attack for each resource on it. Forced: After the engaged player commits a hero to a Sailing test or to a quest, move 1 resource from that hero's resource pool to Corsair Seafarer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When the Stormcaller advances to the next quest stage, Serpent's Blade makes an immediate attack against the engaged player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the beginning of the travel phase, if you are on-course (º), place 2 progress on Jagged Reef. If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), deal 2 damage to each Ship objective instead.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Travel: Move 2 progress from the main quest to the Stormcaller's quest stage.
Response: After Hidden Cove becomes the active location, heal 4 damage from each Ship objective.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Vast Coastland to the Stormcaller’s area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û if you are at the same stage as the Stormcaller.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player contributing at least 8 Ò to the quest must discard a questing character. If your heading is at the worst setting (¾), this effect cannot be canceled.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is The Stormcaller's current quest stage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach Raging Squall to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: After an ally is committed to the quest, deal 1 damage to that ally if you are off-course.”)
